roleset.name: jaded

role.descr: stimulus of cynicism-- what arg1 is cynical about/in response to

roles.note: Arg1 may require concatenation if both actor and action are mentioned.

example.name: arg0 'in response to'
example.text: I think the biggest face slap for me was when-1 he was cynical to my apology, as if all "younger" people in the world are malicious and irresponsible [*-1] .
example.arg: as if all "younger" people in the world are malicious and irresponsible

example.name: both args
example.text: Marta said her payment of $500 was not worth the trauma her family experienced and she was cynical about the lawyers.

example.text: A couple weeks ago Mark said I was cynical to say that welfare capitalism was a vote buying program.
